title: Customer Experience Competency Enhancement: STEM Mathematics Blended Learning Design with Scaffolding-Based Problem-Solving

context.prior_knowledge: High School Mathematics (Calculus, Vectors) and Basic Engineering Problem-Solving Skills
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can decompose complex mathematical problems into an 8-step analytical procedure using the STEM-BDP framework
Learners can explain at least three engineering problem-solving strategies using scaffolded learning materials in both online and face-to-face environments
Learners complete over 80% of real project problems within a week through peer feedback and real-time assessment
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
